forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city greets the day with a gentle promenade of sunshine, promising a high of 63 degrees. The air carries an invigorating coolness, which will gracefully dip to a more subdued 46 as evening approaches. Currently, a mild north-northeast breeze stirs, adding a whispering motion to the day’s unfolding clarity. With visibility untouched by the murky marine layer that sometimes cloaks the bay, the delicate outline of the Golden Gate Bridge stands proud against an expansive sky, offering a vivid invitation to wander.

Today is well-suited for light layers—a soft cardigan or a light jacket draping comfortably over a casual shirt will provide just the right touch against the crispness. As you meander through the streets, perhaps pause for a moment at a sidewalk café, savoring a warming cup of coffee while the city hums with the rhythm of midweek life. A walk along the waterfront beckons, as the sun delicately dances upon the water, creating a perfect backdrop for daydreams and quiet conversations. It’s a day to relish the simple and unassuming pleasures that the city has to offer.
